summary: This is a prisoner production request from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, scheduling Jeffrey Epstein to be produced for a detention hearing on July 18, 2019, before Judge Berman in courtroom 1713. The document is part of the criminal case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB) against Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The prisoner being ordered for production to court for a detention hearing in case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

persons.name: Berman
persons.context: The judge presiding over the detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein scheduled for July 18, 2019, in courtroom 1713.

connections.description: Epstein is the defendant in a criminal case before Judge Berman, who is scheduled to preside over his detention hearing.

events.title: Detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A detention hearing scheduled for Jeffrey Epstein in courtroom 1713 before Judge Berman as part of criminal case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for a detention hearing on July 18, 2019, in the Southern District of New York.
The hearing was to be held before Judge Berman in courtroom 1713.
The document is a formal prisoner production request from the U.S. Attorney's Office.
Epstein's criminal case number is 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).
The document indicates Epstein was in custody under USMS designation 76318-054.
